hero.title: Together We Build the Future of Muslim Youth in the World
hero.subtitle: Join us at Shababna Global from the heart of Istanbul, and be part of a leading Islamic youth community that innovates and impacts the world.

features.title: What We Offer
features.subtitle: Modern Islamic youth programs and events

events.title: Workshops & Events
events.description: Interactive meetings and workshops that enhance values and leadership skills for Muslim youth.

programs.title: Development Programs
programs.description: Long-term programs focused on building character, leadership, and community impact.

community.title: Global Community
community.description: Connect with youth from different Islamic and world countries, and participate in an inspiring environment.

testimonials.title: What Youth Say About Us
testimonials.subtitle: Listen to success stories and impact from our youth around the world
testimonials.content1: Shababna platform completely changed my life. I learned new leadership skills and made friends from all over the world.
testimonials.content2: The development programs helped me develop my technical and leadership skills. I recommend everyone to join.
testimonials.content3: The events and workshops were an amazing experience. I learned a lot about leadership and community impact.
